name: slotfn

body.origin:
|- wfn(c0, universe)
-| wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), universe)
-| wceq(c0, cmpt(hs0, universe, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)

|- wfn(c0, universe)
-| wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), universe)
-| wceq(c0, cmpt(hs0, universe, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)

|- wfn(c0, universe)
-| wceq(c0, cmpt(hs0, universe, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0[Fn]𝕌
⊣ c0 =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0 ` c1))
⊣ d(hs0, 𝕌)

stmt.origin: eqtri(c0, cmpt(hs0, universe, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)), cslot(c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cmpt(hs0, universe, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))
-| wceq(c0, cslot(c1))

body.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0 ` c1))
⊣ c0 = Slot(c1)
⊣ Slot(c1)=(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0 ` c1))

body.origin:

comment: A slot is a function on sets, treated as structures. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
